programme.title: Plantains and Rice, Baby
programme.desc: Alex Hill celebrates Hispanic Heritage Month with her moms recipes as well as some of her own. Shell whip up a coconut coquito cocktail, Cuban-style black beans, a garlicky arroz con pollo with sofrito, and some salty and sweet plantains.

programme.title: Moroccan Lamb with Sangria, Baby
programme.desc: Alex Hill welcomes the coziness of fall with some fabulous flavors And dishes including Moroccan lamb with dates And harissa, fall sangria with apples And amaretto, garlicky rice pilaf, roasted root vegetables, and crispy cucumber salad. Its fall yall!

programme.title: One Pot Meals
programme.desc: Any true struggle cook knows theres nothing better than a one pot dinner. Not only is there hardly any cleanup at the end, but the prep is minimal too, which means hunger satisfaction is imminent. Who says meals cant be cheap, easy and delicious?

programme.title: Eat Your Greens
programme.desc: Going green isnt just a trend; its a no-brainer! When the veggies are in season and the prices are at their lowest, Frankies colorful recipes and zero waste tips will have you celebrating the savings with fresh spring produce.

programme.title: Homemade-ish
programme.desc: Last minute company leaving you in a pinch? Frankie has you covered with these easy recipes featuring store bought staples. With a few Struggle tips, these basic ingredients can be transformed into dishes that will impress your guests.

programme.title: Summer Cookout
programme.desc: Soak up summer with the ultimate outdoor cookout, featuring smashburgers, pasta salad and scrumptious sweets. These classic dishes can be prepared indoors or out, making them the perfect recipes for backyard dinner parties on warm summer nights.

programme.title: Saved By The Bowl
programme.desc: When youre craving a quick nutritious meal, say no more to throwing cash down the gutter for overpriced takeout bowls! Frankie recreates three restaurant favorites for a fraction of the cost, sparing your bank account without sacrificing flavor.

programme.title: Picnic Lunches
programme.desc: Its field trip day, and Frankie shows off his best handheld lunches perfect for leisurely days at the park, the beach or the pool. These sturdy meals are made to travel and only get better with time.

programme.title: Christmas In July
programme.desc: Its July on the calendar but Christmas in our hearts. Frankie whips up three summertime twists on Christmas themed dishes and serves up tips and tricks for celebrating the most wonderful time of year in July.

programme.title: We Knead Pizza
programme.desc: Cancel the pizza delivery, its time to save money and build your pies from scratch. With three different pizza styles, youre bound to find one that satisfies your craving without digging into your wallet.

programme.title: Oktoberfest
programme.desc: Join Frankie as he shares his budget friendly takes on Oktoberfest-inspired dishes, perfect for celebrating the fall season with friends. These festive and hearty meals will keep you cozy and full, and best of all, pair nicely with a beer.

programme.title: Sweater Weather
programme.desc: The air is crisp and the leaves are changing, which means its time to gather round the dinner table for hearty, seasonal meals on a budget. These warm dishes are sure to keep you cozy all season long.

programme.title: Meals Under $7
programme.desc: At a loss when your pantry is empty? With these recipes, you can walk into any grocery store with only $7 and walk out with everything you need for an entire meal. Because yes, you can whip up a nutritious meal at an affordable price!

programme.title: Frankies Italian Faves
programme.desc: Everyone knows Frankie cant live without pasta, but this week he shares his favorite Italian recipes that dont require any kneading. Add these simple, delicious dishes to your weeknight menu to complete your Italian dish repertoire.

programme.title: Whole Chicken 101
programme.desc: Join Frankie to learn the ins and outs of using every part of a chicken, as he demonstrates how to maximize the value and minimize waste. By cooking smarter, youll have three delectable recipes to last you the whole week.

programme.title: Happy Halloween
programme.desc: Boo! Its spooky season, and what better way to get into the spirit than with affordable, party-friendly Halloween dishes that scream trick or treat?! But be warned, these meals are scary good.

programme.title: Between Two Buns
programme.desc: Is it a burger? Is it a sandwich? Is a burger a sandwich? Not even Frankie knows the answer, but one thing is certain: whatever you want to call them, these fun twists and familiar flavor combos are super satisfying to scarf down.

programme.title: Pizza My Heart
programme.desc: On this special delivery episode of Struggle Meals, Frankie explores three ways to make delicious pizzas, and shares clever tips to make an A+ pie without dropping your dough on expensive ingredients.

programme.title: Picnic Lunches

programme.title: Christmas In July
programme.desc: Its July on the calendar but Christmas in our hearts. Frankie whips up three summertime twists on Christmas themed dishes and serves up tips and tricks for celebrating the most wonderful time of year in July.

programme.title: We Knead Pizza
programme.desc: Cancel the pizza delivery, its time to save money and build your pies from scratch. With three different pizza styles, youre bound to find one that satisfies your craving without digging into your wallet.

programme.title: Life After Restaurants
programme.desc: From backyard mariscos to Cantonese remixes of British hand pies to made-to-order slap noodles, Stephanie catches hangs with 3 chefs who left the traditional restaurant scene and found alternative ways to cook for a living and make the food they love

programme.title: Farm Forward Cooking
programme.desc: From a chef creating dishes that combine her Mexican and Indigenous heritage to a pizza pop up that improvs with farmers market ingredients to a backyard-run Indigenous dinner series, Stephanie Izard meets cooks taking their lead from the land.

programme.title: Origins to Originals
programme.desc: From roast chicken to smash burgers to hot sauce, Stephanie Izard meets three different chefs putting their own California-inspired spin on food from their heritage by remixing traditional recipes that center local, fresh ingredients.

programme.title: Unique Eats
programme.desc: From a chef making Italian pasta with Mexican flavors to a groundbreaking functional cocktail bar to a couple that roasts whole goats behind a tire shop, Stephanie Izard finds unique eateries serving up one-of-a-kind food.

programme.title: Family Style
programme.desc: From brothers selling moms Syrian food to a Filipino family remixing a classic dessert to a mom and son running an Indian restaurant out of their house, Stephanie meets multi-gen families turning family recipes into smash hit food business.

programme.title: Pizza Slice, Baby
programme.desc: Alex Hill throws a pizza party with her delicious homemade pies! She creates a sweet and savory pie with spicy pepperoni And pineapple, a tangy BBQ chicken pizza, a grandma deep dish pie with mozzarella And chorizo, and an herby salad flatbread.

programme.title: Plantains and Rice, Baby
programme.desc: Alex Hill celebrates Hispanic Heritage Month with her moms recipes as well as some of her own. Shell whip up a coconut coquito cocktail, Cuban-style black beans, a garlicky arroz con pollo with sofrito, and some salty and sweet plantains.

programme.title: Moroccan Lamb with Sangria, Baby
programme.desc: Alex Hill welcomes the coziness of fall with some fabulous flavors And dishes including Moroccan lamb with dates And harissa, fall sangria with apples And amaretto, garlicky rice pilaf, roasted root vegetables, and crispy cucumber salad. Its fall yall!

programme.title: Doing Brunch Right, Baby
programme.desc: Alex Hill brings big brunch vibes with her favorite weekend dishes including NY-style bacon, egg, and cheese sandwich with black pepper bacon, Maryland-style Old Bay crab cake benedict, coquito French toast bites, and a berry-ful Aperol spritz!

programme.title: Tacos and Margaritas, Baby
programme.desc: Alex Hill hosts a heavenly girls night in, complete with sweet potato tacos with roasted corn salsa, carne asada tacos with orange And spice, and crab and shrimp enchiladas with chili verde. She tops it all off with a fabulous margarita station.

programme.title: One Pot Meals
programme.desc: Any true struggle cook knows theres nothing better than a one pot dinner. Not only is there hardly any cleanup at the end, but the prep is minimal too, which means hunger satisfaction is imminent. Who says meals cant be cheap, easy and delicious?

programme.title: Eat Your Greens
programme.desc: Going green isnt just a trend; its a no-brainer! When the veggies are in season and the prices are at their lowest, Frankies colorful recipes and zero waste tips will have you celebrating the savings with fresh spring produce.

programme.title: Homemade-ish
programme.desc: Last minute company leaving you in a pinch? Frankie has you covered with these easy recipes featuring store bought staples. With a few Struggle tips, these basic ingredients can be transformed into dishes that will impress your guests.

programme.title: MasterChef India
programme.desc: MasterChef is a reality show that features amateur chefs and home cooks as contestants who battle for the MasterChef title. Stay tuned to find out who will be the winner of the title.

programme.title: Solo YOLO
programme.desc: Program perjalanan realiti mengenai eksplorasi solo ke beberapa negara, untuk mengalami keunikan pemandangan dan aktiviti tempat di tempat yang dilawati.

programme.title: Air Tangan Diraja
programme.desc: YM Tengku Maziedah Kaulah Binti Tengku Ahmad Kerabat Diraja Kelantan berkongsi 2 resepi Air Tangan Diraja iaitu Sup Labu dan Bubur Lambuk.

programme.title: Garden of Treasure
programme.desc: Join herbalist Stella for a walk through the Kebun-Kebun, Bangsar as she passes knowledge about traditional herbs to philanthropists, making herbal skincare products And educating the disadvantaged.

programme.title: Extreme Roadtrip
programme.desc: Sebuah rancangan travelog yang akan mengikuti pengembaraan 3 sekawan menerokai tempat-tempat menarik di semenanjung Malaysia demi merealisasikan bucketlist masing-masing.

programme.desc: Program masakan yang berbentuk cabaran kepada isteri-isteri selebriti untuk menjadikan makanan yang paling tidak disukai oleh suami mereka sebagai hidangan yang digemari oleh suami masing-masing.

programme.desc: When her fiance dies on their wedding day, Kim later meets Chung whose mothers house she moves into with him. However, Chung has a secret agenda Kim knows nothing about.

programme.title: The Magician
programme.desc: A talented young magician falls for a princess betrothed to his former teacher, leading to a fierce showdown between the two powerful magicians.

programme.title: Amazon Bullseye
programme.desc: Jin-bong is a former archery medalist and forced to be an archery coach for his companys hidden motives. He meets 3 bowmen in the Amazon Rainforest and embarks on an adventure with them.

programme.title: Peninsula
programme.desc: Set four years after the zombie outbreak, a former soldier and his team return to the zombie-infested wastelands to retrieve a truck of money and try to escape from it alive.

programme.title: Highway Family
programme.desc: A grieving mother met a homeless young family taking shelter in highway rest areas when they asks her for money.

programme.title: The Whistleblower
programme.desc: A disgraced Korean researcher claims to have successfully cloned human embryo stem cells. However, the results were revealed to be fabricated along with other unethical practices later.

programme.title: Single in Seoul
programme.desc: Yeong-Ho is a famous influencer who praises living a single life. Hyeon-Jin is an editor who is desperate about finding her partner. The two meets while working together for a book.

programme.title: 6/45: Lucky Lotto
programme.desc: The excitement of winning a lottery ticket doesnt last long for sergeant Chun-woo as it accidentally ends up crossing the Military Demarcation Line. He must get his act together and find it again!

programme.title: No Mercy
programme.desc: On the journey to find her missing younger sister, she discovered the violence and sexual abuse her sister had suffered and is determined to take a revenge.

programme.title: Firefighters
programme.desc: Based on the Hongje-dong fire accident in 2001, the movie depicts the harsh conditions that firefighters face every day as if it were their last mission to save lives and survive.

programme.title: The Unfair
programme.desc: A protest against urban renewal leads to death of a cop and a teen. The boys father was arrested for the cops death. A young attorney is assigned to defend the father.

programme.title: My Puppy
programme.desc: A groom-to-be sets off with his friend to finding a new owner for his puppy.

programme.title: Secret Zoo
programme.desc: Dreams of landing a permanent position at a top law firm, a lawyer takes on an unusual assignment of keeping an ownerless zoo running by convincing its employees to dress up as animals.

programme.title: Unforgettable
programme.desc: A radio DJ receives a letter written 23 years ago in the past. Through the letter, the story of his first love and friendships of five friends are revealed.

programme.title: The Con Artists
programme.desc: A wily safecracker is forced to help a mob boss pull off a $150 million heist, but smells a double-cross in the works.

programme.title: Decision to Leave
programme.desc: When detective Hae-Joon investigates the death of a man who fell from a mountaintop and meets his wife Seo-rae, he starts to suspect her at the same time that he begins feeling an attraction to her.

programme.title: Juror 8
programme.desc: Based on a true story, eight ordinary people of different backgrounds were selected as the first jury for a murder trial in South Korea in 2008.

programme.title: The Point Men
programme.desc: A diplomat and an National Intelligence Service agent headed to Afghanistan to save South Korean missionaries captured by Taliban. They only have 24 hours...

programme.title: Yoga
programme.desc: Hyo-jung is insecure about her appearance. She joined the yoga academy wishing to restore beauty, yet strange things begin to unfold...

programme.title: The Spies
programme.desc: Kim, a North Korean spy who had lived in South Korea for 22 years is suddenly contacted by his superior. His team plans to complete an earlier mission and steal the targets large stockpile of cash.

programme.title: Sinkhole
programme.desc: As the family celebrates their purchases of a new condo after 11 years of effort, the building was engulfed in a sinkhole due to heavy downpour.

programme.title: Amazon Bullseye
programme.desc: Jin-bong is a former archery medalist and forced to be an archery coach for his companys hidden motives. He meets 3 bowmen in the Amazon Rainforest and embarks on an adventure with them.

programme.title: Veteran
programme.desc: A merciless detective hunts down a young and successful drug addict who always escapes from investigations with the help of his wealth and connections.

programme.title: Deadman
programme.desc: An ace in the barge business makes money by selling his name, is falsely accused of embezzling billions. He fights to reclaim his stolen life from those tied to him solely by name.

programme.title: Double Patty
programme.desc: An aspiring news anchor and a struggling wrestler meets by chance at a burger joint. Through shared meals, they encourage each other to reach for their dreams!

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E069
programme.desc: Al enterarse de que Victoria est libre gracias a que Hilario le entrego Cantarrana a Fernanda; Nicols asegura a la muchacha que el no hubiera aceptado ese trato porque quiere que se imponga la verdad; la joven Guanipa, indignada, lo acusa de ser un traidor que no es capaz de asumir quien es en realidad. La sorpresa se apodera de Caravaggio cuando Fernanda le pide la ayude a conseguir que Felipe Osuna se case con Antonieta, pues ese es el hombre que su hija quiere en realidad. Hilario discute con Nicols exigiendole que se marche cuando llega Victoria y le recuerda a su padre que ya le haba advertido que la perdera si se volva acercar a Florencia.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E070
programme.desc: Hansen ha decidido viajar para alejarse de Adelaida ahora que piensa divorciarse, pues no va a permitirse llenarse de ilusiones de nuevo. Florencia aconseja a Hilario que no se arriesgue a perder a su esposa e hija por ese amor que dice tenerle, pues ella nunca va a poder corresponderle. Marisa se extraa cuando Leopoldo le pide que busque la manera de que el pueda comunicase con Victoria. Adelaida no quiere que Hansen se vaya de viaje aunque admite que no sabe el por que de ese sentimiento; Carlos, que s entiende su sentir, asegura que se va a quedar a su lado a esperar que ella este preparada para aceptar el amor que el le ofrece; la pareja se abraza.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E78
programme.desc: Ante la insistencia de Ezequiel, la respuesta de Camila es que no lo ama y su trato solo es por conveniencia. Max mantiene su cercana a Camila rogndole que vuelva. La carta de Gregorio conmueve a Julia y accede a reunirse con el. Al llegar al hotel encuentran a Astrid y Fernando demostrando su relacion.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E79
programme.desc: Camila furiosa al descubrir que Astrid y Fernando son amantes. Sebastin se presento inesperadamente con Amelia el da de la boda. Nuevamente, tanto Ezequiel como Fausto reciben una mscara de la Santa Muerte y piensan que es obra de El Doliente.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E99
programme.desc: Pastora tells Israel how she hid Illis while she was pregnant and managed to disappear Clara.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E100
programme.desc: Disguised as a nurse, Pastora prepares to inject Clara with poison just as Raul enters the room with the doctor.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E99
programme.desc: Malena seeks to find out if Isabel was the one who snitched on her to the police - Mara Balbina insists to Ricardo about the wedding; and he, surprised, almost reveals himself as he implies that she is not the only one who wants to marry him - Mara Lourdes calls Gertrudis as a witness in court; and although Patricia opposes, Judge Echeverri accepts her as the first to testify against Lorena.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E75
programme.desc: Adriana acusa gran sorpresa cuando Cesar le lleva a Tatianita para que viva con ella, pues es a su lado que quiere que la nia crezca.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E76
programme.desc: Matilde escucha la voz de Emiliano pero descubre que el hombre an no ha llegado; la seora presiente que algo malo puede haberle pasado a su esposo.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E77
programme.desc: Una furiosa Adriana busca a Francesca para exigirle una explicacion del por que se unio a Salvatore Perroni para destruirle la vida a Patricia.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E070
programme.desc: Hansen ha decidido viajar para alejarse de Adelaida ahora que piensa divorciarse, pues no va a permitirse llenarse de ilusiones de nuevo. Florencia aconseja a Hilario que no se arriesgue a perder a su esposa e hija por ese amor que dice tenerle, pues ella nunca va a poder corresponderle. Marisa se extraa cuando Leopoldo le pide que busque la manera de que el pueda comunicase con Victoria. Adelaida no quiere que Hansen se vaya de viaje aunque admite que no sabe el por que de ese sentimiento; Carlos, que s entiende su sentir, asegura que se va a quedar a su lado a esperar que ella este preparada para aceptar el amor que el le ofrece; la pareja se abraza.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E071
programme.desc: Federico confiesa a Fernanda que no estuvo de acuerdo con hacer el video falso contra Victoria, pero que accedio para que ella no dudara de el; sin embargo, al saber que Victoria est libre y ella ahora es la duea de Cantarrana lo hace pensar que a ella en realidad no le importa quien asesino a Leopoldo. Leopoldo quiere que Marisa les diga a Victoria y Federico que alguien lo vio con vida; la mujer se niega porque sabe que eso hara que el se fuera de su casa y ella y Margarita quieren que se quede a su lado por siempre.Luego de escuchar como fue la supuesta negociacion de Jack con Fernanda por el video contra Victoria, Nicols golpea a Jack y se marcha indignado.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E79
programme.desc: Camila furiosa al descubrir que Astrid y Fernando son amantes. Sebastin se presento inesperadamente con Amelia el da de la boda. Nuevamente, tanto Ezequiel como Fausto reciben una mscara de la Santa Muerte y piensan que es obra de El Doliente.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E80
programme.desc: Camila huye de un motorizado que trata de alcanzarla y es sorprendida violentamente por un hombre que la amenaza si se casa con Ezequiel, eso ser su funeral. Ezequiel y ella deducen que puede ser Marcelina la autora intelectual, por su deseo de impedir la boda.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E100
programme.desc: Disguised as a nurse, Pastora prepares to inject Clara with poison just as Raul enters the room with the doctor.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E101
programme.desc: Clara thanks Raul for everything he did to save her life; unable to contain himself, Veladro kisses Clara; the latter begs him to forget her.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E100
programme.desc: Gertrudis testifies against Lorena, talks about the tragedy her family is going through and the pain it caused them to learn that her sons wife murdered her "beloved" husband. Patricia then asks Gertrudis directly if she and Claudio planned Marco Aurelios death.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E101
programme.desc: Gertrudis warns Claudio of the police operation to find him, but he still refuses to undergo surgery to change his face; he prefers to flee the country, even without her - Detective Janet visits Isabel in her apartment, she wants to give her a new opportunity to tell the whole truth about what happened the day her brother Pablo died - It is time to listen to Lorenas testimony in the trial against her.

Adelaida no quiere que Hansen se vaya de viaje aunque admite que no sabe el por que de ese sentimiento; Carlos, que s entiende su sentir, asegura que se va a quedar a su lado a esperar que ella este preparada para aceptar el amor que el le ofrece; la pareja se abraza.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E071
programme.desc: Federico confiesa a Fernanda que no estuvo de acuerdo con hacer el video falso contra Victoria, pero que accedio para que ella no dudara de el; sin embargo, al saber que Victoria est libre y ella ahora es la duea de Cantarrana lo hace pensar que a ella en realidad no le importa quien asesino a Leopoldo. Leopoldo quiere que Marisa les diga a Victoria y Federico que alguien lo vio con vida; la mujer se niega porque sabe que eso hara que el se fuera de su casa y ella y Margarita quieren que se quede a su lado por siempre.Luego de escuchar como fue la supuesta negociacion de Jack con Fernanda por el video contra Victoria, Nicols golpea a Jack y se marcha indignado.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E79
programme.desc: Camila furiosa al descubrir que Astrid y Fernando son amantes. Sebastin se presento inesperadamente con Amelia el da de la boda. Nuevamente, tanto Ezequiel como Fausto reciben una mscara de la Santa Muerte y piensan que es obra de El Doliente.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E80
programme.desc: Camila huye de un motorizado que trata de alcanzarla y es sorprendida violentamente por un hombre que la amenaza si se casa con Ezequiel, eso ser su funeral. Ezequiel y ella deducen que puede ser Marcelina la autora intelectual, por su deseo de impedir la boda.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E100
programme.desc: Disguised as a nurse, Pastora prepares to inject Clara with poison just as Raul enters the room with the doctor.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E101
programme.desc: Clara thanks Raul for everything he did to save her life; unable to contain himself, Veladro kisses Clara; the latter begs him to forget her.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E100
programme.desc: Gertrudis testifies against Lorena, talks about the tragedy her family is going through and the pain it caused them to learn that her sons wife murdered her "beloved" husband. Patricia then asks Gertrudis directly if she and Claudio planned Marco Aurelios death.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E76
programme.desc: Matilde escucha la voz de Emiliano pero descubre que el hombre an no ha llegado; la seora presiente que algo malo puede haberle pasado a su esposo.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E77
programme.desc: Una furiosa Adriana busca a Francesca para exigirle una explicacion del por que se unio a Salvatore Perroni para destruirle la vida a Patricia.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E78
programme.desc: Salvatore trata de quitarle el arma a Azalea pero esta, enajenada, golpea a su esposo con un jarron dejndolo sin sentido y huye dispuesta a arremeter contra Adriana.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E071
programme.desc: Federico confiesa a Fernanda que no estuvo de acuerdo con hacer el video falso contra Victoria, pero que accedio para que ella no dudara de el; sin embargo, al saber que Victoria est libre y ella ahora es la duea de Cantarrana lo hace pensar que a ella en realidad no le importa quien asesino a Leopoldo. Leopoldo quiere que Marisa les diga a Victoria y Federico que alguien lo vio con vida; la mujer se niega porque sabe que eso hara que el se fuera de su casa y ella y Margarita quieren que se quede a su lado por siempre.Luego de escuchar como fue la supuesta negociacion de Jack con Fernanda por el video contra Victoria, Nicols golpea a Jack y se marcha indignado.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E072
programme.desc: Hilario quiere que Adelaida lo acompae a Cantarrana para que convenza a Victoria de que regrese a la capital y deje de sabotear la hacienda, pues con eso solo se est poniendo en peligro; la seora acepta acompaarlo porque se trata de su hija. Victoria se compadece de Federico cuando este, conteniendo el llanto, admite que fue el quien asesino a su pap. Nicols llega a la hacienda con Victoria prendida en fiebre y desvanecida; el joven explica a Adelaida y Fernanda que la encontro sola en medio del camino y ya ordeno a varios peones que fueran en busca de Federico; la seora Alcoy, que no aprueba que la muchacha haya sido llevada hasta la que ahora es su casa, no puede dejar de avergonzarse cuando Adelaida le reprocha su falta de humanidad.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E80
programme.desc: Camila huye de un motorizado que trata de alcanzarla y es sorprendida violentamente por un hombre que la amenaza si se casa con Ezequiel, eso ser su funeral. Ezequiel y ella deducen que puede ser Marcelina la autora intelectual, por su deseo de impedir la boda.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E81
programme.desc: Ezequiel dice que la boda ser en 15 das; Camila aterrada, desahoga su tristeza con Jeli. Tambien Sebastin intenta infructuosamente de convencerla de que no debe

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E101
programme.desc: Clara thanks Raul for everything he did to save her life; unable to contain himself, Veladro kisses Clara; the latter begs him to forget her.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E102
programme.desc: Sure that he has nothing to lose, Cyril plans how to liquidate Pandora.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E101
programme.desc: Gertrudis warns Claudio of the police operation to find him, but he still refuses to undergo surgery to change his face; he prefers to flee the country, even without her - Detective Janet visits Isabel in her apartment, she wants to give her a new opportunity to tell the whole truth about what happened the day her brother Pablo died - It is time to listen to Lorenas testimony in the trial against her.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E102
programme.desc: Mara Lourdes makes her closing speech as Prosecutor of the case and asks for the maximum punishment for Lorena for having murdered Marco Aurelio Corona - Malena proposes to Alfonso that they get married as soon as possible, so that he can guarantee the care and protection of Jose Pablo if she has to go to jail - Patricias closing speech is forceful and fierce, where she makes it very clear that there is not enough evidence to prove Lorenas guilt.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E77
programme.desc: Una furiosa Adriana busca a Francesca para exigirle una explicacion del por que se unio a Salvatore Perroni para destruirle la vida a Patricia.

programme.title: Dropped - S05:E04 - Bone Weary
programme.desc: The Keefer brothers take shelter in a small pine outcropping as a winter storm sets siege to the river. Forced to wait out the arctic blast, the brothers try and retain what little energy they have left.

programme.title: Wardens - S02:E06 - Operation Bitterroot
programme.desc: Montanas Game Wardens have their hands full on the first day of big game season. Tag along as they check out the Bitterroot game area. And to nab poachers, theyve got a clever sting operation going, using a mobile decoy.

programme.title: Backcountry Rescue - S01:05 - 3 in 1 Day
programme.desc: For Jess, life at home feels out of control. But shes got the work routine dialed in, even as the team is hit with an unprecedented three rescues in under twelve hours.

programme.title: Gold Fever - S21:E08 - Rock Crusher
programme.desc: Tom and Kia bring a portable rock crusher to a hot spot in the Superstition Mountains of Arizona, hoping to crush quartz and rocks in search of gold.

programme.title: Savage Wild - S04:E01 - Manny Goes Medieval
programme.desc: Manny demonstrates his medieval skills, taking a huge wild boar with Viking-style spears.

programme.title: Carters W.A.R. - S01:E08 - Secret Trade
programme.desc: Ivan Carter investigates Africas infamous poaching trade.

programme.title: Royal Documentaries - S01:E11 - Royal Children Prince William and Prince Harry
programme.desc: Two young men who have had to cope with extraordinarily challenging events and circumstances as, together, they have gone on to change the face of the British royal family and carve meaningful roles for themselves in the modern world. Made in 1999 two years after the death of their mother, Princess Diana, this original and touching documentary examines the lives of the royal princes, the legacy of their mother, the responsibilities of being a royal - and what the future holds for them.

programme.title: Carters W.A.R. - S01:E06 - The Zambezi River Mystery
programme.desc: Carters W.A.R. (Wild Animal Response) is the untold story of one mans quest to save his homeland, the worlds most wild and dangerous continent on earth, Africa. From heavily armed poachers butchering elephants for their tusks to the slaughter of rhinos for their horns, Africas most precious resource is in peril. Can one man expose the truth and make a difference? Watch as wildlife detective and professional hunter, Ivan Carter, takes you inside the real Africa to the front lines of the wars being waged on its wildlife.

programme.title: Savage Wild - S03:E03 - Canal Monster
programme.desc: As he continues to explore Floridas man-made canals, an enormous alligator attacks Manny.

programme.title: Savage Wild - S03:E04 - Sharks of the Gulf Stream
programme.desc: Manny atttracts the most dangerous sharks of the gulf stream.

programme.title: Savage Wild - S03:E05 - Hammer Time
programme.desc: Manny is paid a visit by a massive great hammerhead shark.

programme.title: Savage Wild - S03:E06 - Escape from the Everglades
programme.desc: Manny shows you how to hike 10 miles out of the Everglades and survive in this beautiful and deadly place.

programme.title: Man Eats Wild - S01:E01 - Alpine Ghosts
programme.desc: Mario takes on the unforgiving alpine mountains of the south island of New Zealand in a fallow deer hunt with his bow, and cooks an impressive venison pie dish.

programme.title: Man Eats Wild - S01:E02 - Deadly Outback
programme.desc: In the outback of Australia where everything is trying to kill you. Its monsoon season when no one attempts to roam around with salt water crocodiles lurking. Mario links up with a long time friend in search of a wild Buffalo.

programme.title: Man Eats Wild - S01:E03 - Up with the Gods - Himalayan Tahr
programme.desc: Mario teams up with good friend and precision rifle expert Bernard and heads into the high alpine mountains above New Zealands rugged West Coast. Drawing on his Greek roots, Mario cooks a rustic Kleftiko dish in an earth oven.

programme.title: Man Eats Wild - S01:E04 - Outback Odyssey
programme.desc: In one of the harshest environments on the planet, Mario travels to the outback desert of Australia in search of feral camels that have been running rampant. What seemingly feels to be a a simple task quickly turns into one of the hardest and most unexpected challenges he has taken on. With a bow in hand and scorching heat he explores the great dividing range, in hope of harvesting one of these middle eastern based beasts.

programme.title: Sasquatch Mountain Man - S02:E04 - Moose 2
programme.desc: Laramy is on the hunt for a moose with his Hawken rifle.

programme.title: Sasquatch Mountain Man - S02:E05 - Mountain Mule Deer
programme.desc: Sasquatch, Laramy Miller, hunts the badlands of Montana for mule deer.

programme.title: Sasquatch Mountain Man - S02:E06 - Bear
programme.desc: Laramy is in search of a bear with his Hawken rifle. The bear will be used to provide Laramy with warmth in the cold winters ahead

programme.title: Sasquatch Mountain Man - S02:E07 - Mountain Lion 1
programme.desc: Laramy Miller rides on horseback with his dogs by his side, hunting the elusive mountain lion in the Rocky Mountains.

programme.title: Royal Documentaries - S01:E12 - The New Royals
programme.desc: Princesses Beatrice and Eugenie have gone through a lot of media attention and tough situations in their lives. From their parents very public split to being targeted by the press, theyve been through quite a bit. Despite all this, they remain dedicated to supporting the monarchy with their charity work. Through serving the Commonwealth, both sisters continue to make a positive impact.

programme.title: Dropped - S05:E05 - Fireside Fortune
programme.desc: Using up the last of their energy, the Keefer brothers make their way down stream in search of their next supply cache. The tide turns as they finally make their way out of the open tundra and into the heart of moose country.

programme.title: Dropped - S05:E06 - Now or Never
programme.desc: With lifted spirits, the Keefer brothers set out to spot and stalk a herd of caribou near by, but closing in proves more difficult than expected.

programme.title: Wardens - S02:E07 - Operation H2O
programme.desc: Being dedicated to safeguarding our precious natural resources in some of the nations most remote places ensures that every workday is exciting.

programme.title: Backcountry Rescue - S01:E06 - Bombs Away
programme.desc: Jamie puts his trust in The New explosives technology to keep ski slopes safe and the local highways open all winter. But his barrage of anti-avalanche bombs is not enough to save everyone.

programme.title: Gold Fever - S21:E09 - Gold, Sweat and Dragons Blood
programme.desc: Tom and Kia explore a mysterious mine in Colorado.

programme.title: Savage Wild - S04:E03 - Black Bear Explosion
programme.desc: Manny explores a Florida swamp swarming with black bears.

programme.title: Savage Wild - S04:E04 - Pitch Black
programme.desc: Manny explores a primitive river in pitch black darkness And encounters a monster.

programme.title: Carters W.A.R. - S01:E09 - Man and Man Eaters
programme.desc: Ivan Carter learns the truth about what happens when lions and humans live side by side in Africa.

programme.title: Royal Documentaries - S01:E13 - William And Kate One Year On
programme.desc: William and Catherine got married in a fairytale ceremony on April 29, 2011, with more than two billion people tuning in and celebrations happening all around the world.

programme.title: Royal Documentaries - S01:E12 - The New Royals

programme.title: Footballs Greatest Stage - S01:E05 - Pele, Stockholm, Sweden, Eisenhower, The Beatles, World Cup 1958
programme.desc: The story of Pele taking the World Cup by the scruff of the neck at the age of 17 is legend. And we all know what we went on to do after that. On the cusp of reunification, West Germany triumphed in 1990, while a couple of French legends helped their nation to the peak of World Cup glory in 1998. Its all in this installment of Footballs Greatest Stage

programme.title: FIBA World Basketball - S01:E48 - 24 September 2025
programme.desc: Germanys strong teamwork helped them win the FIBA EuroBasket title after their success at the 2023 World Cup.

programme.title: The Inside Line - S05:E41 - 23 September 2025
programme.desc: McLaren is off to Singapore, needing only 13 points to clinch its second consecutive constructors title, marking its first back-to-back wins since the glory days with Honda from 1988 to 1991.

programme.title: Against the Odds - S01:E22 - Johan Cruyff, Neymar
programme.desc: On this episode of Against the Odds we salute two of the most mercurial footballers the game has even known, the era-defining Johan Cruyff and Brazil superstar Neymar.

programme.title: ABP Aquabike World Championship - S01:E06 - AQUABIKE SEASON REVIEW 2024
programme.desc: The UIM-ABP Aquabike World Championship is gearing up for an exhilarating 2025 season as the prestigious international jet-ski series enters its 31st year.

programme.title: F1 H2O - S01:E09 - F1H2O ROAD TO SHARJAH HIGHLIGHTS
programme.desc: This episode offers an exhilarating recap of the 2023 UIM F1H2O World Championships climactic finale at the Grand Prix of Sharjah. Set against the backdrop of the Khalid Lagoon in the UAE, the episode captures the intensity and drama as top drivers vie for the championship title.

programme.title: Against the Odds - S01:E13 - Christiano Ronaldo, Zinedine Zidane, Eusebio
programme.desc: In this episode of Against the Odds, we look at the brilliant career of Ronaldo, perhaps the only Brazilian footballer to rival Pele; we examine Zinedine Zidane as a player and a manager who reached the top in both fields; and we pay tribute to 1960s legend Eusebio.

programme.title: Clubland - S01:E03 - Tottenham Hotspur, AC Milan
programme.desc: Tottenham Hotspur are building for the future. Plus, AC Milan is a legend of Serie A

programme.title: WDSC - S01:E01 - WDSC ERZINCAN 2024 LUGE HIGHLIGHTS
programme.desc: The World Downhill Skateboarding Championship (WDSC) held its Erzincan leg in June 2024, featuring thrilling street luge races.

programme.title: Clubland - S01:E07 -Juventus Torino, Red Star Belgrade
programme.desc: Juventus rich history makes them the girlfriend of Italy and the world. Plus, Serbias Red Star Belgrade

programme.title: Clubland - S01:E06 - Chelsea, Olympiacos Pireu
programme.desc: Chelsea FCs millions make it one of the Worlds biggest clubs. Plus, Greeces Olympiacos

programme.title: Clubland - S01:E17 - FC Porto, Al Ahly
programme.desc: FC Porto and Al Ahly, big names in history for two different places on the planet.

programme.title: FIBA World Basketball - S01:E48 - 24 September 2025
programme.desc: Germanys strong teamwork helped them win the FIBA EuroBasket title after their success at the 2023 World Cup.

programme.title: Sail GP Highlights - S02:E10 - Geneva Highlights
programme.desc: The Swiss crew, under Sebastien Schneiters leadership, made it to the Final and grabbed a spot on the podium. The home crowd and local support really helped them out.

programme.title: E1 Champions of the Water - S02:E03 - Dubrovnik
programme.desc: Get ready for an electrifying experience as the E1 Series heads back to the stunning Adriatic city of Dubrovnik. In Episode 3, dive into the thrilling action of electric hydrofoil RaceBirds, where sharp strategies and stunning landscapes come together for an unforgettable showdown.

programme.title: E1 Highlights - S02:E05 - Monaco
programme.desc: Experience the thrill of electric foiling at almost 50 knots with Monacos beautiful skyline as your backdrop, and dont miss the eco-focused talks happening around the event.

programme.title: E1 Highlights - S02:E01 - Jeddah
programme.desc: Dani Clos and Mashael Alobaidan led Aoki Racing to win both group-stage races. Even after losing the first final, they managed to grab the overall win, with Steve Aoki celebrating right by the track.

programme.title: E1 - S02:E06 - UIM E1-Weltmeisterschaft in Dubrovnik
programme.desc: Get ready for more heart-racing action as the UIM E1 World Championship took over Dubrovniks Adriatic Sea on June 1314, 2025. With the historic city walls and beautiful sights of the UNESCO Old Town, the famous RaceBird boats zoomed at 50 knots, making it an unforgettable event

programme.title: The Immortals - S01:E037 - Niki Lauda, James Hunt, Sir Jackie Stewart
programme.desc: Niki Lauda, James Hunt, Sir Jackie Stewart

programme.title: The Football Review - S05:E71 - 22 September 2025
programme.desc: Almost 25 years after his first time with Benfica, Jose Mourinho is returning to his old stomping grounds, signing on for another period with the Portuguese club.

programme.title: E1 - S02:E10 - Re-Live Monaco Race Off
programme.desc: Team Blue Rising dominates in Monacos challenging water course, setting the stage for crucial upcoming rounds in the series.

programme.title: Sail GP Highlights - S02:E09 - St Tropez Highlights
programme.desc: The ROCKWOOL France Sail Grand Prix in Saint-Tropez got shortened due to bad weather, allowing just one whole day of racing. Great Britain took the win, with New Zealand in second and Spain in third. Even with the storm causing the event to end early, fans got to see amazing speed and strategic battles on the French Riviera, making the season standings remain exciting as they head towards the final in Abu Dhabi.

programme.title: Uncharted Sail GP - S01:E01 - Man Overboard
programme.desc: Welcome to SailGP, the fastest race on the water.

programme.title: Sail GP Highlights - S02:E05 - San Francisco Highlights
programme.desc: Get ready for the thrill of SailGP as the tour makes waves on the famous San Francisco Bay! This highlight video showcases the most exciting parts of the San Francisco Grand Prix, featuring lightning-fast starts, almost-collisions, clever tactics, and jaw-dropping finishes.

programme.title: E1 - S02:E07 - Re-Live Lake Maggiore Place Race and Finals
programme.desc: Tight merges and tactical racing made Final 1 an exciting showdown, with commentators calling it "the tightest merge weve ever seen."
